features01.title: Complete Online Store
features01.description: Create your professional online store in minutes, with product catalog, cart, and optimized checkout.

features02.title: Admin Dashboard
features02.description: Manage everything in one place: products, orders, customers, and reports in an intuitive interface.

features03.title: Product Management
features03.description: Add products with variations, photos, inventory, and pricing. Organize by categories and tags.

features05.description: Choose from multiple themes and customize colors, fonts, and layout to match your brand.

features06.title: Multi-tenant

features09.title: Security and Scalability

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.description: Sign up for free in less than 2 minutes. No credit card required, no commitment.

step2.title: Customize your store
